sources.title: The File on Thelma Jordon (1949)
sources.description: Cleve Marshall, an assistant district attorney, falls for Thelma Jordon, a mysterious woman with a troubled past. When Thelma becomes a suspect in her aunt's murder, Cleve tries to clear her name. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-file-on-thelma-jordon-1949/

sources.title: The File on Thelma Jordon (1949)
sources.description: Cleve Marshall, an assistant district attorney, falls for Thelma Jordon, a mysterious woman with a troubled past. When Thelma becomes a suspect in her aunt's murder, Cleve tries to clear her name. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-file-on-thelma-jordon-1950/

metadata.Plot: Assistant District Attorney Cleve Marshall, depressed about marital troubles, is drowning his sorrows in a bottle of whiskey when the mysterious and alluring Thelma Jordon walks in to report an attempted burglary. The two become romantically involved and not long afterwards there is a burglary and murder at Thelma's aunt's house. Cleve is drawn further and further into defending and covering up for Thelma. It soon becomes clear that this road will only lead to disaster.
metadata.Actors: Barbara Stanwyck, Wendell Corey, Paul Kelly
